page.title: 12HEALTH CARE IN TARBERT
page.content: In Tarbert there are three doctors. There are also some district nurses for different parts of Harris.There is one dentist in the North of Harris.The dentist hours are flexible but he is usually in his surgery from 9.30am to about five o clock.Instruments which he uses in a day are his high speed drill,mirror forceps,probes and evacutors.Most of his medical supplies come from Glasgow and take about one month but the easy stuff he can get from Stornoway.Most children hate going to the dentist but afterwards they can be sure that they will have no sore teeth.Old folk don't have to worry so much because most of them have no teeth at all or have such bad teeth that they can't feel the pain at all.I think our dentist Mr Deas is a good dentist becuase once he is finished you feel much better.
